cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on November 17, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4494, Frederick Jobs and Historic Preservation Training Center Land Acquisition Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 125 (Friday, July 16, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TRONE:
H.R. 4494.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H3634]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 416.

title: Frederick Jobs and Historic Preservation Training Center Land Acquisition Act
